title: Council Decision of 8 May 2007 appointing members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the Field of Architecture
header:
17.5.2007 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 111/5
COUNCIL DECISION
of 8 May 2007
appointing members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the Field of Architecture
(2007/C 111/04)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The following shall be appointed members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the Field of Architecture from the date of this Decision until 9 March 2009:
A.   Experts from the practising profession
Country Members Alternates
Bulgaria Mr Petko YOVCHEV Mr Boiko STOLINCHEV
France Mr Philippe-Charles DUBOIS Ms Nicole ROUX-LOUPIAC
Romania Prof. Emil Barbu POPESCU Mr Vlad GAIVORONSCHI
B.   Experts from universities or equivalent teaching institutions in the field of architecture
Country Members Alternates
Bulgaria Prof. Dr. Vesselina Russeva TROEVA Prof. Dr. Yordan RADEV
France Mr Jean-Pierre BOBENRIETHER Mr Jean-Michel KNOP
Romania Prof. Stefan SCAFA UDRISTE Prof. Virgil ONOFREI
C.   Experts from the competent authorities of the Member States
Country Members Alternates
Bulgaria Ms Ivana RADONOVA Ms Zara DOBREVA
France Ms Laurence CASSEGRAIN Ms Claudie VIATTE
Ireland Mr Chris O'GRADY
Romania Prof. Sanda Marina BADULESCU Ms Oana Mihaela SALOMIA
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 May 2007.
For the Council
The President
P. STEINBRÜCK
